game.name: Duck Shooter
game.description:
A wonderful bird shooting game has just been introduced and we are glad today to bring it to you. We are damn sure that you will also fall in love with this endless carnival style shooting game. Do you think it is the right to try it out? Join Duck Shooter and get ready to challenge your shooting skills in a way you have not done before! All you need to do is just move the scope and click the spacebar key to shoot ducks before they disappear from the screen. 

Hit the ducks with the help of 3 limited bullets in this one of the best html5 shooter games! You will lose a life if you would let the ducks fly away. Move the scope using arrow buttons or keys! You will these smug little ducks zipping from side to side in this free online duck shooter game. Do not take your steps back and show the world that how itchy your trigger finger is! Remember you do not have enough time to waste. So, aim your target fast and shoot as many ducks as possible before they fly away from the screen in this arcade html5 game. 

Do not hit the red ones otherwise you will lose some points! You will also be in trouble in case of hitting an egg in this free online shooting game. Every second and your every shot counts in this one of the best action games for boys. Your clock gets the precious second for your every successful shot. Try to challenge your focus skills to beat your high score in this skill-based gameplay! Click or tap to shoot perfectly to ensure your win! You will surely fall in love with this classic duck shooter game. Good luck to have fun in this retro survival game!
